website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei MediaPad M3 Lite 10 is a sleek 10-inch tablet with a nice display and solid speakers, but it offers little to justify the premium over less expensive tablets from Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: One year on.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for a year now and decided to write a further review. Overall this is not a bad tablet but not all that good after a year. The battery life has dropped quite a bit and the fingerprint recognition has stopped working which is a nuisance as every time I stop using it I have to enter the code again. Not good. The fingerprint recognition is poorly designed compared with my Huawei phone, this is a great one from Huawei. Shame they did not use the same one as the phone!

product_meta.title: Huawei MediaPad M3 10" Lite Tablet - (Qualcomm Octa-core 1.4GHz, RAM 3GB, ROM 32GB, IPS-Display) - Grey
product_meta.description:
HUAWEI MediaPad M3 Lite 10 (MediaPad M3 Lite 10 for short) is an 10.1-inch tablet computer that incorporates a high-performance octa-core processor (MSM8940) and Wi-Fi data connectivity.

With a light metal frame and full-metal effect design, the M3 Lite 10 thickness 7.1mm, weight 460g , Which is stylish and easy to carry. The M3 Lite 10 has an IPS screen with a resolution of 1920 × 1200 pixels. It comes with a 8 MP front camera and a 8 MP rear camera.

With support for high-speed network connections, 1080p full HD video playback, Office, and GPS, BDS positioning and navigation, the M3 Lite 10 is a smart assistant of life entertainment. The M3 Lite 10 creatively comes with four large-power speakers with intelligent sound channel switching technology.

With Harman Kardon audio adjustment technology and Huawei's super wide sound (SWS) 3.0 technology, the M3 Lite 10 delivers the superior audio experience. The M3 Lite 10 runs on Huawei's unique Emotion UI 5.1 based on the Google Android N (Nougat) operating system.

2 Years Huawei Manufacturer's Warranty offered with dedicated Huawei Service Hotline Support.
